WorkflowInfo.Description: Map all volume's LUNs to an iGroup

WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information
This workflow maps all volume's LUNs to a specified iGroup. This workflow should be triggered by a Self Service request.

Requirements:
* NetApp module is configured and Up.

Input Variables (variables recieved from the Self Service request):
* NetApp Cluster
* Vserver
* iGroup
* Volume Name

Output
A report table containing the LUNs' paths and ID's.

Error.Name: NetApp
Error.ErrorDetails: Workflow contains module activity that contain incorrect type. current type=10. needs to be type=31

Error.Name: NetApp
Error.ErrorDetails: Workflow contains module activity that contain incorrect type. current type=10. needs to be type=23
